question: Which among the following is not correct about VD savarkar?
option1: He is considered a central figure in the Hindu nationalist Movement
option2: He supported and took part in the Quit India struggle in 1942
option3: He founded a revolutionary organization called Mitra Mela
option4: He was one of those accused in the assassination of Mahatma Gandhi
answer: He supported and took part in the Quit India struggle in 1942
explanation: Serving as the president of the Hindu Mahasabha, Savarkar opposed the Quit India struggle in 1942.
